heading: Home Page
alt: poster for UN Development goals guide for local councils.
p1: Our Goal as an SAC is to deliver key information on some of the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals; namely Zero Hunger (Goal 2), Clean and Affordable Energy(Goal 7), and Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions(Goal 16).
p2: The United Nations Sustainable Development Goals are the culmination of many years of co-operation between countries and the UN to bring about a more sustainable and bright future by taking actions to improve sustainability.
p3: The 17 sustainability goals, alongside 169 targets collectively form the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, which was recognised by all UN member states back in 2015.
p4: Some key events leading up to the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development:
li2: 2000 Millennium Summit(UN HQ, New York, USA) - Millennium Development Goals
li3: 2002 World Summit on Sustainable Development(Johannesburg, South Africa) - commitments to end poverty and increase multilateral co-operation
p5: Along with many more recent developments and conferences.
